item.title: Fuel Pump Low PRESS Lights – Operative Pump

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated EICAS message is verified to operate once each flight day.

placard.para: Placard affected PRESS Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: Verify Low PRESS Lights for wing MAIN tank boost pump(s).
Verify associated EICAS message(s) for affected tank(s) fuel boost pump(s).
Turn all tank fuel boost pumps to OFF.

note.para: APU must be OFF to perform test.

numlitem.para: Verify the following messages are displayed on EICAS:
Turn all wing main tank fuel boost pumps to ON.

note.para: Ensure that tanks contain sufficient fuel to cover boost pumps.

numlitem.para: Verify the following messages are not displayed on EICAS.
For the operative fuel boost pumps, ensure the following messages are not displayed on EICAS:

note.para: The message will remain displayed for any inoperative boost pump(s).

numlitem.para: Turn off pump(s) one at a time with inoperative light(s).
Verify associated EICAS message is displayed for affected pump.
Restore system to normal as required.
Verify Low PRESS Light for center tank boost pumps.
Verify associated EICAS message(s) for affected tank pump(s).
Turn all tank fuel boost pumps to OFF.

note.para: APU must be OFF to perform test.

numlitem.para: Verify the following messages are displayed on EICAS:
Simulate engines running by one of the following methods:

warning.para: OBSERVE AMM PRECAUTIONS BEFORE ACTIVATING SPEED CARDS.

note.para: Operating both engines can replace engine run-up simulation.

numlitem.para: Turn all wing main and center tank boost pumps to ON.

note.para: Ensure that tanks contain sufficient fuel to cover boost pumps.

numlitem.para: Verify the following messages are not displayed on EICAS.
For the operative fuel boost pumps, ensure the following messages are not displayed on EICAS:

note.para: The message will remain displayed for any inoperative boost pump(s).

numlitem.para: Turn OFF center tank pump(s) one at a time with inoperative light(s).
Verify associated EICAS message is displayed for affected pump.
Remove engine speed card simulators, if activated.
Position crossfeed valve switch, as required.
